channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OnePlus Promo Code: $100 Off | October 2025 | WIRED
item.description: Save 20% with a OnePlus coupon this month, plus save up to 10% on earbuds, phones, and more.

item.title: People Who Say They’re Experiencing AI Psychosis Beg the FTC for Help
item.description: The Federal Trade Commission received 200 complaints mentioning ChatGPT between November 2022 and August 2025. Several attributed delusions, paranoia,...

item.title: One startup’s quest to store electricity in the ocean
item.description: Sizable Energy has a plan to store excess renewable energy in flexible reservoirs out at sea. The startup has raised $8 million to test prototypes.

item.title: Resistant Bacteria Are Advancing Faster Than Antibiotics
item.description: One in six laboratory-confirmed bacteria in 2023 proved resistant to antibiotic treatment, according to the World Health Organization—all related to a...

item.title: Essential Gear for an Emergency Kit—for Cars or Go-Bags
item.description: We consulted preparedness experts and WIRED's team of testers for the essential gear in case of wildfires, earthquakes, and lord knows what else.

item.title: NASA’s Boss Just Shook Up the Agency’s Plans to Land on the Moon
item.description: Sean Duffy called out SpaceX for being “behind schedule” on a lunar lander and said he’d explore other options.

item.title: Sesame, the conversational AI startup from Oculus founders, raises $250M and launches beta
item.description: Former Oculus CEO Brendan Iribe’s new startup, Sesame, is building AI-powered smart glasses with natural, humanlike voice interaction. Backed by Sequo...

item.title: Open source agentic startup LangChain hits $1.25B valuation
item.description: As TechCrunch previously reported, the maker of a popular open source framework for building AI agents has officially become a unicorn.

item.title: OpenAI’s new browser is a broadside shot at Google
item.description: OpenAI's new browser announcement made it clear exactly how much Google has to lose in the AI era.

item.title: Netflix goes ‘all in’ on generative AI as entertainment industry remains divided
item.description: Netflix isn't planning to use generative AI as the backbone of its content but believes the technology has potential as a tool to make creatives more ...
